DOC.brief_summary: To test whether ivabradine give combination atenolol able improve exercise tolerance patient stable angina pectoris
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Ivabradine Top Atenolol Stable Angina Pectoris
DOC.criteria: Chronic stable angina pectoris Documented coronary artery disease Previous treatment atenolol betablocker agent Exercise tolerance test positivity stability Heart rate < 60 bpm Congestive heart failure
